quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: PC Partner Group Limited is a Singapore-based investment holding company principally engaged in the design, development and manufacturing of VGA Cards for desktop PCs, EMS, and the manufacturing and trading of other PC-related products and components. The Company also offers one-stop electronic manufacturing services to brands all over the world. Its key products are video graphics cards, motherboards and mini-PCs. Its primary brands include ZOTAC, Inno3D and Manli. For products under its own brands, the Company and its subsidiaries sell them to more than 70 countries across various regions, either directly from its headquarters or through its subsidiaries in Hong Kong, Japan, Korea, the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China and the United States. It provides EMS to brands, including providers of ATM and POS systems, industrial devices such as accelerator cards and control cards, and various types of consumer electronic products, such as electronic clocks and wireless thermometers.
